dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4743 IH: Colleges for the American People Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tiffany (for himself and Mr. Clyde) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To repeal section 14(g)(5)(A) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Colleges for the American People Act of 2025 or the CAP Act of 2025.

section.header: Numerical limitations related to employees of institutions of higher education
section.text: Section 214(g)(5)(A) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1184(g)(5)(A)) is repealed.
